<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quickened Attunement](/Feats.aspx?ID=3004) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 213 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Geomancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=100)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Geomancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2995); Legendary in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Requirements**
Your previous action was Attunement Shift.

</column>

---

If your next action is to cast a spell that would grant your terrain attunement bonus, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (to a minimum of 1 action).

**Special** You can't use Quickened Attunement and [Quickened Casting](/Feats.aspx?ID=199) in the same round.
name: Quickened Attunement
requirement: Your previous action was Attunement Shift.
